remove.sel: /aiscript/attention[@min='visible']/actions/do_while[@value="$target.isoperational and (($target.owner == faction.player) or $leaderpilot) and (this.assignedcontrolled.isformationwingman or ($iscarrierbased and @this.assignedcontrolled.dock.container == $target) or $target.dock or (((@$target.order.id == 'DockAndWait') or (@$target.order.id == 'DockAt')) and $target.hascontext.{$target.order.$destination.zone}))"]/wait/interrupt/conditions/check_any/check_all/check_any/check_all/check_any/check_all/check_any/check_value[@value='this.assignedcontrolled.isplayerowned']
